      • random

        public static double random(double max)
        Get a random number from 0 to a maximum value.
        Parameters:
        max - Maximum value.
        Returns:
        Random number between 0 and max.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if max <= 0.

      • random

        public static double random(double min,
                            double max)
        Get a random number in a given range.
        Parameters:
        min - Maximum value.
        max - Maximum value.
        Returns:
        Random number between min and max.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if min > max.
